entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.9°C

Humidity: 91 %

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
